title: Social Media Graphic Designer
job_overview:
Project Based Pay: $2 (USD) Per Post (minimum 70 posts/month)

About Us:
CannDelta is a woman and BIPOC-owned cannabis consulting firm specializing in licensing services, regulatory guidance, and marketing support for cannabis businesses. We help entrepreneurs navigate the complex cannabis industry with expertise and passion. Our offices are based in Toronto, New York, and New Jersey, and our team is fully remote.

Position Overview:
CannDelta is looking for a talented and versatile Part-Time Graphic Designer to join our marketing team. This role is perfect for a designer who thrives in a fast-paced, multi-project environment and is passionate about social media and web design. You will create eye-catching visuals for social media posts. Tight deadlines and the need for creativity will make this a dynamic and rewarding role for a proactive individual.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design engaging social media graphics to drive brand awareness and engagement.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to bring visual concepts to life for various projects.
- Manage multiple design projects simultaneously while meeting tight deadlines.
- Assist with design revisions and updates across various platforms and assets.
- Stay updated with design trends and best practices to ensure fresh and innovative work.

Qualifications:
- Strong experience with graphic design tools.
- Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop is a bonus.
- Knowledge in AI art generation is a bonus.
- Excellent time management skills and the ability to handle multiple projects.
- Ability to meet tight deadlines and adapt quickly to changing priorities.
- A creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and design consistency.
- A passion for design and visual storytelling.

To Apply:
Please send your resume & portfolio to Upgrade to see actual info

CannDelta is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
